metadata.title: CVE-2020-1776 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description: When an agent user is renamed or set to invalid the session belonging tothe user is keept active. The session can not be used to access ticket datain the case the agent is invalid. This issue affects ((OTRS)) CommunityEdition: 6.0.28 and prior versions. OTRS: 7.0.18 and prior versions, 8.0.4.and prior versions.

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
